postToolUse.name: console-log-detection
postToolUse.description: Warn about console.log in modified files
postToolUse.action: if grep -q 'console\.\(log\|warn\|error\)' "${FILE_PATH}"; then echo '⚠️  Warning: console.log detected in ${FILE_PATH}. Remove before committing.'; fi

preToolUse.name: git-push-review
preToolUse.action: echo '⏸️  About to push to remote. Review changes first? (Press Enter to continue)'
